name: vscode-jest-runner
description: Run and debug Jest, Vitest, Node.js, Bun, and Deno tests with ease, right from your editor.
author: Tristan Teufel

oneOf.description: Jest config path (relative to `${workspaceFolder}` e.g. jest-config.json)
A mapping of file globs to jest config paths. Useful when you need to run different jest configurations based on the file naming convention.

.*.description: The target jest config path for the matched file glob.

jestrunner.defaultTestPatterns.description: Fallback patterns used when no 'testMatch'/'testRegex' (Jest) or 'include' (Vitest) configuration is found.

jestrunner.useNearestConfig.description: If jestrunner.configPath is set and this is true, the nearest matching jest config in the path hierarchy will be used instead of the root path.

jestrunner.playwrightConfigPath.description: Absolute or relative path to the Playwright config file.

jestrunner.disablePlaywright.description: Disable the Playwright test runner integration.

jestrunner.playwrightRunOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Playwright Command

jestrunner.playwrightDebugOptions.description: Add or override VS Code debug configurations for Playwright. Only applies when debugging Playwright tests.

jestrunner.debugOptions.description: Add or overwrite vscode debug configurations (only in debug mode) (e.g. { "args": ["--no-cache"] })

jestrunner.runOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Jest Command e.g. https://jestjs.io/docs/en/cli

jestrunner.jestCommand.description: Define an alternative Jest command (e.g. for Create React App and similar abstractions)

oneOf.description: Vitest config path (relative to `${workspaceFolder}` e.g. vitest.config.ts)
A mapping of file globs to vitest config paths. Useful when you need to run different vitest configurations based on the file naming convention.

.*.description: The target vitest config path for the matched file glob.

jestrunner.vitestRunOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Vitest Command e.g. https://vitest.dev/guide/cli.html

jestrunner.vitestDebugOptions.description: Add or override VS Code debug configurations for Vitest (e.g. { "args": ["--no-cache"] }). Only applies when debugging Vitest tests.

jestrunner.nodeTestCommand.description: Define an alternative Node.js test command (defaults to 'node')

jestrunner.nodeTestRunOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Node.js test runner command (e.g. --experimental-test-coverage)

jestrunner.nodeTestDebugOptions.description: Add or override VS Code debug configurations for Node.js test runner. Only applies when debugging node:test tests.

jestrunner.bunRunOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Bun test command

jestrunner.bunDebugOptions.description: Add or override VS Code debug configurations for Bun. Only applies when debugging bun tests.

jestrunner.denoRunOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Deno test command

jestrunner.denoDebugOptions.description: Add or override VS Code debug configurations for Deno. Only applies when debugging deno tests.

jestrunner.disableFrameworkConfig.description: If true, the extension will ignore any framework configuration files (e.g. jest.config.js, vitest.config.ts) and use the `jestrunner.defaultTestPatterns` instead.

jestrunner.enableCodeLens.description: Bring back the old CodeLens feature (Replaced by new VsCode Testing API & Test Explorer)

jestrunner.enableTestExplorer.description: Enable the Test Explorer integration using VS Code's Testing API

jestrunner.enableESM.description: Manually enable ESM support. When true, adds `--experimental-vm-modules` to NODE_OPTIONS.

jestrunner.codeLens.description: Enable desired codeLens, possible value : 'run', 'debug', 'watch', 'coverage', 'current-test-coverage'. Defaults to ['run', 'debug']

jestrunner.changeDirectoryToWorkspaceRoo.description:
Changes directory before execution. The fallback order is:
1. `jestrunner.projectPath`
2. the nearest `package.json`
3. `${workspaceFolder}`

jestrunner.preserveEditorFocus.description: Preserve focus on editor when running tests

jestrunner.enableDebugLogs.description: Enable debug logging to the 'Jest Runner' output channel for troubleshooting

jestrunner.maxBufferSize.description: Maximum buffer size in MB for test output (default: 50MB)
